metadata.title: Meysson Engineering — Industrial Engineering in Côte d'Ivoire
metadata.description: Meysson Engineering, your strategic partner in industrial engineering, maintenance, energy and telecoms in Côte d'Ivoire. Over 100 years of combined expertise.

footer.description: Strategic partner in industrial engineering, maintenance, energy and telecoms in Côte d'Ivoire.

home.hero_subtitle: More than a service provider, Meysson Engineering is your strategic partner. Our experts combine over {years} years of experience in industrial engineering, maintenance and telecoms.
home.domains_subtitle: Meysson Engineering operates in the strategic sectors of the Ivorian industry with recognized field expertise.
home.domain_energie_desc: Design of industrial systems, plant setup and energy optimization. We integrate industrial IoT for measurable and sustainable performance.
home.domain_raffinerie_desc: Preventive and corrective maintenance on critical petrochemical sites. Heat exchangers, columns, furnaces, tanks — we guarantee operational continuity.
home.domain_telecoms_desc: Design of industrial networks (LAN/WAN, fiber optics), data centers and cybersecurity of critical systems for resilient connectivity.
home.services_subtitle: Each service is designed to generate a concrete and measurable return on investment.
home.trust_item1: 100+ years of combined expertise by our founders
home.trust_item2: Former experts from SIR, ENERTEAM and major industrial groups
home.trust_item3: Operations in Côte d'Ivoire and across the sub-region
home.trust_item4: Field-based approach focused on measurable performance
home.explore_about_subtitle: Discover the history, vision and team behind Meysson Engineering — a strategic partner born in the field.
home.explore_expertises_subtitle: Energy, industrial maintenance, telecoms — three domains of excellence serving your performance.
home.explore_services_subtitle: Audit, engineering, IoT, cybersecurity — technical solutions designed for measurable ROI.
home.explore_references_subtitle: Concrete results, satisfied clients. Discover our case studies and testimonials.
home.explore_contact_subtitle: An industrial project? Our team of experts responds within 48 hours.
home.cta_subtitle: Free diagnosis, feasibility study or quote request — our team of experts responds within 48 hours.

services.audit_desc: Complete diagnosis of your energy flows to identify savings opportunities and optimize your consumption.
services.engineering_desc: Advanced studies for the design of custom industrial facilities, from feasibility to commissioning.
services.iot_desc: Deployment of SCADA systems, IIoT sensors and analytics platforms to manage your performance in real time.
services.maintenance_desc: Planned maintenance programs and corrective interventions to maximize the availability of your critical equipment.
services.electrical_desc: Design and installation of high and low voltage electrical systems, transformer substations and compliance audits.
services.cyber_desc: Protection of OT networks, PLCs and data centers against cyber threats, with redundancy and continuity planning.

about.hero_title: A strategic partner for Ivorian industry
about.hero_subtitle: Founded by seasoned engineers, Meysson Engineering transforms technical challenges into lasting performance.
about.history_title: Born in the field, committed to results
about.history_p1: Meysson Engineering was born from the desire of exceptional professionals — from companies such as SIR (Société Ivoirienne de Raffinage) and ENERTEAM — to put their expertise at the service of Ivorian industrial companies.
about.history_p2: Faced with a rapidly expanding market (PIRME Plan 2025-2030, oil discoveries, infrastructure development), we chose to position Meysson as a local reference: reactive, expert, and above all committed to concrete results.
about.history_p3: Our approach is simple: understand your challenges, propose solutions adapted to your operational reality, and support you until results are delivered.
about.vision_text: To become the leading industrial partner in Côte d'Ivoire and the West African sub-region, recognized for technical excellence and commitment to measurable performance.
about.vision_promise: "Transforming your technical challenges into lasting gains."
about.values_subtitle: Four core principles guide each of our interventions.
about.value1_desc: We favor concrete and immediately applicable solutions, adapted to the realities of the Ivorian industrial field.
about.value2_desc: Our engineers intervene directly on site, with in-depth knowledge of equipment and operational constraints.
about.value3_desc: Each mission concludes with measurable performance indicators: savings achieved, machine availability, ROI.
about.value4_desc: We build long-term relationships with our clients, supporting them through every stage of their industrial growth.
about.team_subtitle: Engineers and experts from the world's leading industrial groups, serving your performance.
about.engagement2: Confidentiality and protection of client data
about.engagements_cta: Ready to start your project with a team of experts committed to your results?

expertises.hub_subtitle: Meysson Engineering concentrates its expertise on the strategic sectors of the Ivorian and West African industry.
expertises.hub_cta_subtitle: Our engineers have cross-industry experience. Contact us to discuss your specific challenge.
expertises.energie_subtitle: From design to continuous optimization of your industrial and energy systems.
expertises.energie_approach_title: Engineering at the service of your performance
expertises.energie_p1: In a context where energy often represents the first or second cost center of an industrial unit, energy optimization is no longer optional — it is a strategic lever.
expertises.energie_p2: Meysson Engineering designs and optimizes your energy production and distribution systems, combining classical technical mastery with digital technologies (IoT, SCADA, predictive AI).
expertises.energie_p3: Our team intervenes from preliminary studies through to final acceptance, including installation supervision and team training.
expertises.energie_s1_desc: Methodical diagnosis of energy consumption on industrial or commercial sites. Mapping of energy flows (electricity, heat, cold), identification of energy-intensive equipment and quantified recommendations.
expertises.energie_s2_desc: From feasibility to turnkey commissioning. Design of factories, production lines, electrical substations and energy distribution systems.
expertises.energie_s3_desc: Installation and maintenance of HV/LV substations, transformers, backup generators, TGBT switchboards. Compliance with NF and IEC standards.
expertises.energie_s4_desc: Integration of SCADA systems, programmable controllers (PLC) and IIoT sensors for real-time management and predictive maintenance.
expertises.energie_b1: Reduction of energy bills by up to 30%
expertises.energie_b4: Progressive and controlled transition to Industry 4.0
expertises.energie_b5: Measurable ROI from the first year
expertises.energie_case_title: Energy audit of a food processing unit
expertises.energie_case_desc: Following an audit of a 5,000 m² food processing plant, our recommendations led to a 22% reduction in electricity consumption in 6 months, with the investment recouped in 18 months.
expertises.energie_cta_title: An engineering project or energy audit?
expertises.energie_cta_subtitle: Our engineers are available for a free initial consultation.
expertises.raffinerie_subtitle: Ensuring operational continuity of your most critical installations.
expertises.raffinerie_p1: In the petrochemical and refining industry, every unplanned hour of downtime translates into considerable production losses. Maintenance is not a cost — it is a strategic investment.
expertises.raffinerie_p2: Our engineers, with experience at SIR and other critical industrial sites, master the specific constraints of these environments: ATEX standards, strict HSE procedures, multi-trade coordination.
expertises.raffinerie_p3: We offer comprehensive maintenance contracts or one-off interventions, always with the same level of rigor.
expertises.raffinerie_s1_desc: Planned maintenance programs for heat exchangers, columns, furnaces and tanks. Periodic inspection, early replacement and CMMS monitoring for zero unplanned downtime.
expertises.raffinerie_s2_desc: Rapid response to breakdowns. Our mobile teams intervene 24/7 on petrochemical sites to restore operations as quickly as possible.
expertises.raffinerie_s3_desc: Maintenance and optimization of industrial refrigeration systems: compressors, heat exchangers, cooling towers and refrigerant circuits.
expertises.raffinerie_s4_desc: Planning and management of major maintenance shutdowns (TAR) on refineries and chemical units. Team coordination, schedule and budget control.
expertises.raffinerie_b2: Reduction of unplanned corrective maintenance costs
expertises.raffinerie_b3: Compliance with HSE standards of petrochemical sites
expertises.raffinerie_case_desc: On a site with 8 production units, implementing an annual preventive maintenance plan reduced unplanned corrective interventions by 65% and increased overall OEE by 12 points in one year.
expertises.raffinerie_cta_subtitle: Free technical diagnosis. Our experts come to your site.
expertises.telecoms_subtitle: Connecting, securing and supervising your industrial information systems.
expertises.telecoms_p1: The growing interconnection of industrial systems (OT) with IT networks creates considerable efficiency opportunities, but also new cybersecurity risks.
expertises.telecoms_p2: Meysson Engineering helps Ivorian industrial companies build robust, secure and scalable telecom architectures that comply with international standards.
expertises.telecoms_p3: From factory networks to data centers, including centralized supervision, we cover the full spectrum of critical infrastructure.
expertises.telecoms_s1_desc: Design and deployment of industrial communication networks (industrial Ethernet, fiber optics, Wi-Fi 6). Redundant architecture for maximum availability.
expertises.telecoms_s2_desc: Design, construction and management of server rooms and data centers. Secured power supply (UPS, generators), air conditioning and 24/7 monitoring.
expertises.telecoms_s3_desc: Cyber risk assessment, industrial firewall deployment, OT/IT network segmentation, incident response plans. Protection of SCADA systems and PLCs against cyber threats.
expertises.telecoms_s4_desc: Deployment of unified supervision platforms (NOC), real-time dashboards, proactive alerts and availability reports for your critical infrastructure.
expertises.telecoms_b2: Protection of control systems against cyberattacks
expertises.telecoms_b3: Reduced intervention times through centralized supervision
expertises.telecoms_b4: Compliance with ANSSI standards and IEC 62443
expertises.telecoms_case_title: OT security of a 100 MW power plant
expertises.telecoms_case_desc: Cybersecurity audit, OT/IT segmentation and industrial firewall deployment on a 100 MW power plant. Result: regulatory compliance and zero cyber incidents in 18 months post-deployment.
expertises.telecoms_cta_subtitle: Free OT cybersecurity audit for the first 5 qualified applications.

services.hero_title: Our technical solutions at your service
services.hero_subtitle: Each service is designed to generate a measurable and lasting return on investment.
services.cta_subtitle: Our team analyzes your situation and proposes a tailored solution, with pricing and timelines.

items.audit_desc: Methodical diagnosis of energy consumption on industrial or commercial sites. Flow mapping (electricity, heat, cold), identification of energy-intensive equipment and quantified recommendations.
items.audit_b2: Audit report with prioritized action plan
items.audit_use: Food industry, commercial buildings, hospitals, hotels
items.engineering_desc: Advanced engineering studies for the design of industrial installations: FEED studies, detailed engineering, project management assistance and construction supervision.
items.engineering_b1: Reduction of technical risks from the design stage
items.engineering_b2: Control of delivery costs and schedules
items.engineering_b3: Standardized deliverables (P&ID, isometric drawings, energy balances)
items.iot_desc: Deployment of SCADA systems, IIoT sensors, programmable controllers (PLC) and data analytics platforms for real-time management and predictive maintenance.
items.iot_b1: Full visibility on performance in real time
items.maintenance_desc: Preventive maintenance programs and corrective interventions on critical industrial equipment. Planned shutdown management and comprehensive maintenance contracts.
items.electrical_desc: Design and installation of high and low voltage electrical systems: transformer substations, switchboards, cabling, backup generators and electrical compliance audits.
items.electrical_b1: Electrical safety and regulatory compliance (NF, IEC)
items.electrical_b3: Service continuity with backup power supply
items.electrical_use: Industrial zones, commercial buildings, sensitive sites
items.cyber_desc: OT network cyber risk assessment, OT/IT network segmentation, industrial firewall deployment and business continuity plan (BCP) development.
items.cyber_b1: Protection against cyberattacks targeting SCADA systems
items.cyber_use: Power plants, refineries, water networks, data centers
items.automation_desc: Integration of automated systems (robots, conveyors, packaging lines), KPI definition and dashboard creation for operational management.
items.training_desc: Tailored training sessions for your technical teams: preventive maintenance, SCADA system management, industrial HSE safety, and OT cybersecurity awareness.

references.hero_subtitle: Concrete results, satisfied clients. Discover how Meysson Engineering has transformed industrial challenges into lasting performance.
references.cases_subtitle: Three representative examples of our way of working and the results we deliver.
references.case1_title: 22% reduction in energy costs — Processing plant
references.case1_context: A 5,000 m² processing plant faced a constantly rising electricity bill (+18% over 3 years). The goal: identify savings without massive investment.
references.case1_solution: Comprehensive energy audit (electricity + cold + compressed air), implementation of 12 priority recommendations and installation of 8 IoT monitoring sensors.
references.case1_r4: Compliance with new Ivorian energy standards
references.case2_title: 65% reduction in unplanned downtime — Critical industrial site
references.case2_context: A petrochemical site with 8 production units experienced an average of 4 unplanned shutdowns per month, representing considerable production losses.
references.case2_solution: Implementation of an annual preventive maintenance plan, deployment of a CMMS system and training of internal teams in maintenance best practices.
references.case2_r3: Equipment service life extended by 3 years
references.case3_title: OT security of a 100 MW power plant
references.case3_context: Faced with the rise in cyberattacks on African critical infrastructure, a power plant wanted to assess and strengthen its OT security posture.
references.case3_solution: IEC 62443 cybersecurity audit, OT/IT network segmentation, Fortinet industrial firewall deployment, and development of an incident response plan.
references.case3_r1: Zero cyber incidents in 18 months post-deployment
references.testimonial: "Meysson Engineering understood our operational constraints from the very first meeting. Their maintenance plan transformed our approach to industrial reliability. The results speak for themselves, and the team is always available."
references.cta_title: Your project could be our next reference
references.cta_subtitle: Contact our experts to discuss your industrial challenges.
